transArray.content: The front desk service is warm and the location is great. I am very satisfied with my stay in the room. I have stayed here for many days. I will choose this Orange Hotel next time. There is also free coffee to drink, which is very good.

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking tickets for free parking. The travel route can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is equipped with complete facilities, electric curtains, refrigerated small refrigerator, and snacks, fresh oranges and self-service coffee machines are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories. , sincerely looking forward to your next visit! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
